content:

title: Hurricane season is over. Here’s why the US never got hit.

en: Hurricane season is over. Here’s why the US never got hit.. For the first time in a decade, the country avoided landfall, thanks to an atmospheric anomaly. But this hurricane season was exceptional in other bad ways, too.

de: Powell und Lyles helfen den Opfern des Hurrikans auf Jamaika. Die zweifache 100-m-Weltrekordhalterin Asafa Powell tut sich mit dem olympischen Goldmedaillengewinner Noah Lyles zusammen, um den Opfern des Hurrikans Melissa auf Jamaika zu helfen.
en: Powell and Lyles helping Jamaica hurricane victims. Two-time 100m world record holder Asafa Powell teams up with Olympic gold-winning sprinter Noah Lyles to help Hurricane Melissa victims in Jamaica.
la: Powell et Lyles victimas turbines Jamaicae adiuvant. Duo tempore 100 milium mundi possessor Asafa Powell iunctos iungit cum Olympico auro-victo concito Noe Lyles ad auxilium Procellae Melissae victimarum in Jamaica.

title: Filipino typhoon survivors sue Shell over climate change
description: Survivors of a deadly 2021 typhoon in the Philippines have filed a lawsuit against British oil giant Shell, seeking financial compensation for climate-related devastation, three NGOs supporting them said Thursday. Typhoon Rai struck the southern and central r…
content:

Survivors of a deadly 2021 typhoon in the Philippines have filed a la… [+3977 chars]
de: Philippinische Taifun-Überlebende verklagen Shell wegen Klimawandel. Überlebende eines tödlichen Taifuns im Jahr 2021 auf den Philippinen haben eine Klage gegen den britischen Ölgiganten Shell eingereicht und fordern eine finanzielle Entschädigung für die klimabedingten Schäden, wie drei sie unterstützende NGOs am ​​Donnerstag mitteilten. Der Taifun Rai traf den südlichen und zentralen Raum.
en: Filipino typhoon survivors sue Shell over climate change. Survivors of a deadly 2021 typhoon in the Philippines have filed a lawsuit against British oil giant Shell, seeking financial compensation for climate-related devastation, three NGOs supporting them said Thursday.
